metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18701 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in cp-demangle.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31. There is a stack consumption vulnerability resulting from infinite recursion in the functions next_is_type_qual() and cplus_demangle_type() in cp-demangle.c. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via an ELF file, as demonstrated by nm.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2018-12697 to CVE-2018-12700

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
